text: He mominaharu! Timila'i hatya gari'eko manisako sambandhama kisasa (samanatako kanuna) ko adesa di'i'eko cha svatantra manisako badalama svatantra manisa ra dasako satta dasa ra striko badala stri ho yadi hatyarala'i hatya gari'eko vyaktiko daju bha'iko tarphabata ksamadana garincha bhane tyasa upakarala'i svikara garnuparcha. Hatya gari'eko varisala'i citta bujhdo tarikale mamga garema ucita rupama ksatipurti garnu pardacha. Yo pratipalakako tarphabata timila'i suvidha ra krpa ho. Jasale yasapachi pani simako ullanghana gardacha, tyasala'i kastadayaka sajaya hunecha
